text: Efkleidis Somos () was a Greek politician and lawyer. Somos was born in Korçë (Korytsa), Northern Epirus, in modern southern Albania. He was elected as member of the Greek parliament (1915-1917) for the Korytsa prefecture when his homeland came under Greek control. ==References== Category:Greek MPs 1915–1917 Category:Northern Epirotes Category:People from Korçë Category:Greek lawyers
title: Efkleidis Somos
